At Shama Luxe Sukhumvit Bangkok all rooms come with bed linen and towels. Central Embassy is 4.7 km from the accommodation, while Queen Sirikit National Convention Centre is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 28 km from Shama Luxe Sukhumvit Bangkok.

name: Rose Hotel
description: The Rose Hotel is an intimate boutique hotel that provides an oasis from the busy city and features contemporary Asian-styled rooms that are elegantly furnished. Guests will be pleased with the friendly and efficient service combined with the comfortable and relaxing accommodation. The Rose Hotel also provides several services and facilities. Guests can lounge around the outdoor swimming pool set amidst a lush tropical garden, while sipping a cool drink. It also has a fitness centre for guests to work-out and recharge after a long day out. The hotel's on-site restaurant Ruen Urai Fine Thai Cuisine is popular amongst locals and foreigners alike, serving delicious classic Thai fare. The Rose Hotel also has easy access to transportation links. It is within walking distance from Saladang BTS Skytrain station and Sam Yan MRT station.

name: Shangri-La Bangkok
address: 89 Soi Wat Suan Plu, New Road, Bangkok 10500
description: Situated along the Chao Phraya River, Shangri-La Bangkok boasts a 10,000-sqf Fitness Centre and the multi-awarded Chi, The Spa at Shangri-La. Among its 9 dining options is an award-winning restaurant. Guests can join daily aerobics and exercise classes at the hotel, or play a game of tennis. Shangri-La Bangkok also has a spa pool, sauna and steam room. Other facilities include a shopping arcade. Offering city or river views, rooms at the Shangri-La feature Thai décor with silk and wood furnishings. Each room is equipped with a flat-screen satellite TV, a safety deposit box, and a minibar. Authentic Thai cuisine is served at Salathip Restaurant where guests can enjoy its live music and at-home luxury atmosphere. The re-envisioned 'Volti Tuscan Grill & Bar’ showcases the world’s finest meats, cooked in authentic Tuscan smoked and wood-fire style. The Chocolate Boutique offers an indulgent range of sweets and hot drinks. Located in Silom, Shangri-La Bangkok is adjacent to Saphan Taksin BTS Skytrain Station. A shuttle boat service to ICONSIAM Shopping Mall is available from Sathon Pier. Driving from Suvarnabhumi International Airport takes around 40 minutes.

name: Bandara Suites Silom
description: Located in Silom District, Bandara Suites offers rooms and suites with a flat-screen TV and free Wi-Fi. It features 2 dining options, 2 swimming pools and a pool bar. Free WiFi is available throughout. Situated in one of Bangkok City’s shopping, dining and entertainment districts, Bandara Suites is a 10-minute walk from MRT Silom and BTS Saladaeng stations. Each room and suite at the Bandara Bangkok has a minibar, tea/coffee maker and electronic safe. Attached bathrooms include a shower and bathtub. Suites come with a kitchenette. Guests enjoy a welcome drink upon arrival. Recreation facilities include a fitness centre, an outdoor hot tub, and sauna rooms. Free parking is provided. Japanese cuisine and saké is served at Touka Restaurant where there is an open kitchen.the Restaurant is open 11.00-14.00hrs. and 17.00-23.00 hrs. daily

name: DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sukhumvit Bangkok
description: Begin your stay at the inviting DoubleTree by Hilton Hotel Sukhumvit Bangkok with a warm welcome and a delicious chocolate chip cookie upon arrival. Set in the heart of Bangkok’s major business, leisure and entertainment districts, the contemporary Bangkok hotel is close to The Emporium leisure complex and the lush Benjasiri Park and offers easy access to the Phrom Pong BTS Skytrain Station, the Expressway and Airport. All of the stylish, light and airy guest rooms at this Bangkok hotel are tastefully decorated using muted, contemporary colors and natural wood accents and offer LCD TVs and wired and wireless internet access. Upgrade to a luxurious suite for additional space and amenities. Plan your business or social event at this Bangkok hotel with a variety of flexible space available, all of which feature WiFi and the very latest in audio/visual equipment. Food lovers at this modern hotel in Bangkok will be spoiled for choice in our relaxed diner where you can savor Thai, Vietnamese and Western dishes for breakfast, lunch and dinner. Sip cool drinks and enjoy western and Thai grilled specialties while you listen to music by live DJs in our casual poolside bar, Grillz. Keep fit in the complimentary 24-hour fitness center, or cool down with a dip in our rooftop infinity swimming pool, offering unparalleled views over the city.Hilton

name: The Narathiwas Hotel & Residence Sathorn Bangkok
description: Located a 10-minute drive to Central Rama III, The Narathiwas Hotel & Residence Sathorn Bangkok offers free WiFi throughout the property. Boasting an indoor swimming pool, the hotel provides free public parking. The hotel is a 15-minute drive to Chong Nonsi BTS Skytrain Station and Silom Shopping centre. Donmueng Airport is a 30-minute drive away, while Suvarnabhumi International Airport is a 40-minute ride from the hotel. Each modern air-conditioned room features a flat-screen cable TV, safe, sofa, fridge and microwave. Shower facilities and hairdryer are included in an en suite bathroom. For extra convenience, there is a 24-hour front desk. Laundry services are available. Helpful staff can offer assistance with shuttle service arrangements. Guests can enjoy a game of tennis, while children use the kid’s club. A wide range of Thai and International cuisine can be sampled at Nara Cuisine.

name: Riva Surya Bangkok
description: Located on the charming Phra Arthit Road, Riva Surya Bangkok offers stylish air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi. The hotel is equipped with a fitness centre and two swimming pools for adults and kids. The property is a 5-minute walk to Khao San Road and a 10-minute walk to The Bangkok National Museum. Suvarnabhumi Airport is a 1 hr drive away. Tastefully furnished with contemporary decor, rooms at Riva Surya feature a flat-screen TV, an iPod docking station and a safety deposit box. A minibar and an electric kettle are provided. Free toiletries and a bathrobe are included in an en suite bathroom. Some rooms come with a private balcony. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can assist guests with laundry services and safety deposit box. Other conveniences include an on-site tour desk and free private parking. Guests can also enjoy the stunning views of the river from the restaurant on site. With indoor and outdoor dining options, the babble & rum Restaurant daily serves diverse and delectable authentic Thai, Asian and European cuisines. With sweeping views of the Chao Phraya River, The Garden and Mezzanine Bar offer a wide range of wine and cocktails. Room service is available upon request.

name: Intercontinental Bangkok
description: In central Bangkok and one of the city's largest hotels, InterContinental Bangkok provides ultra-modern luxury and a true cosmopolitan escape. The hotel stands adjacent to the BTS Chitlom Skytrain station, making travel to local cultural attractions quick and convenient. Thailand's largest shopping malls are within walking distance such as Central World and Central Chitlom and major world-class medical centers can be reached in a mere 10 minutes. Visit now for Bangkok’s best weather of the year.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Metropole Bangkok
description: Boasting an outdoor pool overlooking the Bangkok skyline, Metropole Bangkok is a low-rise accommodation located in a convenient area of Bangkok with a private parking area available on site. Free WiFi is accessible in all public areas. Guests can enjoy delectable meals served at the restaurant on site. All air-conditioned rooms here are decorated with luxurious. Each room features a comfortable bed and a seating area at a corner of the room. A flat-screen TV, reading lamps and coffee/tea facilities are provided. The en suite bathrooms come with free toiletries. Emporium and EmQuartier Shopping Malls are a 20-minute drive from Metropole Bangkok, while Terminal 21 Department Store is reachable within a 25-minute drive. Camillian Hospital is 600 metres and Bangkok Hospital is 750 metres away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi International Airport, 22 km from the property.

name: Silver Gold Garden Suvarnabhumi Airport
description: Loсated on Luangpeng Road, Silver Gold Garden features non-smoking guestrooms, a restaurant and a business centre. The hotel is 3.5 km from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. The spacious rooms at Silver Gold Garden, Suvarnabhumi Airport are air-conditioned and have plenty of natural light. Rooms are fitted with private balconies and hardwood furnishings. Amenities include cable TV and a minibar. Gold Silver Garden is 50 metres from Tesco Lotus Hypermarket and the nearest 7-11 convenience store. It is just 200 metres from the lively shops and colours at Mahanakorn Floating Market. Guests can enjoy traditional Thai massages and foot reflexology treatments at the spa. The hotel provides room and laundry services. Currency exchange services are also available. Dining options at the hotel include the on-site restaurant, which serves a wide spread of Thai dishes and beverages.

name: Hotel Icon Bangkok Sukhumvit 2
description: Located within a 10-minute walk of BTS Phloen Chit Station, Hotel Icon Bangkok is an ideal base while visiting Bangkok. The multiple amenities this modern hotel offers include a rooftop terrace, free Wi-Fi and valet parking. Hotel Icon Bangkok has a gym with a swimming pool. There is also a BBQ area available for guests to enjoy. Just a stone's throw from nearby bars and clubs, this 4-star hotel also allows guests to easily explore the local nightlife. The rooms are air conditioned and include a refrigerator, a flat-screen TV and a seating area. They each provide an in-room closet, a telephone and an in-room safe. Following a meal in the stylish restaurant, guests can enjoy a drink in the bar before heading onto Hotel Icon Bangkok's nightclub. Attractions near the hotel include Soi Cowboy, China Resources Tower and Terminal 21. It is within a 20-minute walk of Asok BTS Skytrain Station, which allows for easy access in and around Bangkok.Revato

name: Burnt Oak Motel
description: Ideally located in the prime touristic area of Pratunam, Richly Villa promises a relaxing and wonderful visit. The property features a wide range of facilities to make your stay a pleasant experience. Service-minded staff will welcome and guide you at the Richly Villa. Guestrooms are fitted with all the amenities you need for a good night's sleep. In some of the rooms, guests can find television LCD/plasma screen, complimentary instant coffee, complimentary tea, internet access – wireless (complimentary), non smoking rooms. The hotel offers various recreational opportunities. Richly Villa combines warm hospitality with a lovely ambiance to make your stay in Bangkok unforgettable.Agoda

name: Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queens Park
address: 199 Sukhumvit Soi 22, Klong Ton, Klong Toey, Bangkok 10110
description: Discover a tranquil oasis in the heart of Sukhumvit at Bangkok Marriott Marquis Queen's Park. Stay at our luxury hotel in Bangkok to meet, play, dine and sleep in Thailand's exotic capital. Perfect for Thailand business trips and vacations, our hotel in Sukhumvit is a short walk from popular downtown attractions and within easy reach of the BTS Skytrain, MRT subway, Queen Sirikit National Convention Center (QSNCC) and Suvarnabhumi Airport. Unwind at our pool and spa after a busy day of work or exploring Bangkok. Savor exceptional cuisine in our award-winning restaurants, which feature Chinese, Japanese and Thai dishes. Host an impressive corporate event in 53,000 square feet of function space with capacity for up to 1,500 attendees. At day's end, retire to your hotel room or suite, where you'll enjoy luxury amenities and polished décor that blends classic Thai influences with modern accents. Many of the accommodations at our Sukhumvit, Bangkok hotel showcase breathtaking views of the downtown city skyline.Marriott

name: Ariyasomvilla Hotel
description: Ariyasom Villa - SHA Extra Plus is a peaceful garden oasis within busy Bangkok City, conveniently located at the start of Sukhumvit Road. Presenting 1940s heritage Thai decor, it has a cosy outdoor pool, an organic restaurant and a pampering spa. With high ceilings and large windows opening out to landscaped gardens, stylish rooms are spacious and decorated in warm colours. Featuring free Wi-Fi, each comes with a flat-screen TV and DVD player. En suite bathrooms have a bathtub and hairdryer. This family-owned boutique hotel is just next to Bumrungrad Hospital, about 650 metres from Ploen Chit BTS Skytrain Station. Via the Skytrain, it is a 5-minute journey to shopping at Central World Plaza and Siam Paragon. Som Sen Spa provides relaxing body massage and a small fitness room. The elegant library is decorated with local artwork and is a casual place for guests to read or mingle. Na Aroon Restaurant serves a healthy selection of vegetarian and seafood dishes. It also offers room service from 07.00-22.00 hrs.

name: Hotel Solo Sukhumvit 2
description: Hotel Solo, Sukhumvit 2, Bangkok - SHA Extra Plus is a boutique hotel offering stylish accommodation with free Wi-Fi. It has an outdoor pool, a restaurant and a free shuttle service to Sukhumvit Road. Solo Sukhumvit 2 Hotel is a 10-minute walk to Ploenchit BTS Skytrain Station and Ploenchit Centre. The hotel is a 35-minute taxi ride from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Rooms at the Hotel Solo Bangkok feature modern decor and wooden flooring. Each room has a flat-screen cable TV and an espresso machine. The private bathroom is equipped a rainshower and electronic scale. Guests can swim at the rooftop pool or make use of the free laptops in the lobby. Day trips can be arranged at the tour desk. Solo Hotel Sukhumvit also provides laundry services and free parking. Sala Di Solo is an all-day restaurant serving Asian, Western and fusion dishes and has outdoor dining. Guests can enjoy coffee and cocktails underneath the stars at the Cloud 9 Bar.

name: Cheqinn Hostel Sukhumvit 4
description: This chic Bangkok hostel is situated within a 10-minute walk of BTS Phloen Chit Station. It is located just a short stroll from many popular bars, clubs and restaurants. There are a range of amenities on offer to those staying at Jellybean Cheqinn Hostel, including a coffee bar, a laundry service and free Wi-Fi. Jellybean Cheqinn Hostel features 47 air conditioned rooms. The hostel provides a conveniently located on-site café. In the evening, guests can enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Jellybean Cheqinn Hostel is close to the area's tourist attractions, including Embassy of the United States, China Resources Tower and Terminal 21, which are a short walk away. It is within a 20-minute walk of Asok BTS Skytrain Station, which allows for easy access in and around Bangkok.Revato

name: The Promenade Hotel - Sha Plus
description: Situated in the heart of Bangkok, The Promenade Hotel - SHA Plus is just 100 metre away from Nana BTS Skytrain Station. This property has a coffee shop and snack bar. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout. The Promenade Hotel - SHA Plus is 200 from Nana Square and 500 metre from Bamrungrad Hospital. It is 2.8 km from Patpong Street and 22 km from Suvarnabhumi Airport. Guests enjoy free on-site parking. Comfortable rooms are provided with air conditioning and complimentary tea/coffee sets. Other amenities include a flat-screen cable TV, a fridge and a minibar. En suite bathrooms feature a bathtub and free toiletries. For convenience, the residence offers a 24-hour front desk and a laundry service. Staff at the tour desk can assist with sightseeing and travel arrangements. Guests can sample local dishes at many restaurants located around the property.

name: Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8
description: Set in Bangkok, 1.7 km from Central Embassy, Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8 offers accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Ideally set in the Khlong Toei district, this hotel features a terrace, as well as a sauna and a hot tub. The property is 1.9 km from Amarin Plaza, and within 1.3 km of the city centre. All guest rooms come with air conditioning, a flat-screen TV with cable channels, a fridge, a kettle, a shower, free toiletries and a wardrobe. Featuring a private bathroom with a hairdryer, rooms at the hotel also feature free WiFi, while selected rooms also feature a city view. All rooms at Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8 are fitted with a seating area. Guests at the accommodation can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. For guests' convenience, Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8 has a business centre. Languages spoken at the 24-hour front desk include English and Thai. Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 2.1 km from the hotel, while Emporium Shopping Mall is 2 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 24 km from Hope Land Hotel Sukhumvit 8.

name: Like Sukhumvit 22
description: Like Sukhumvit 22 offers accommodation in Bangkok, 300 metres from Queen Sirikit National Convention Center MRT Station. Featuring a balcony, the air-conditioned apartments comes with a seating area and a dining area. All units feature a small kitchen equipped with a microwave and refrigerator. A stovetop and kettle are also featured. There is a private bathroom with a shower in each unit. Towels and bed linen are offered. Like Sukhumvit 22 also includes a fitness centre. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is a 40-minute drive from the property.

name: Glow Sukhumvit 5
description: Located in Bangkok, 2.7 km from Emporium Shopping Mall, GLOW Sukhumvit 5 provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a terrace. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi. The property is 1.4 km from the city centre and 1.1 km from Central Embassy. The hotel offers an American or Asian breakfast. Popular points of interest near GLOW Sukhumvit 5 include Amarin Plaza, Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall and Central World. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 26 km from the accommodation.

name: The Sukosol
description: No description found

name: Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel
description: A minute’s walk from Ratchadamri Skytrain Station, Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel is a touch of Thai luxury in the city. The hotel features a spa, an outdoor pool and free parking. Rooms feature elegant touches of Thai culture, offering décor made of teak and Thai silk. A flat-screen TV and DVD player are provided. Grand, en suite bathrooms showcase elegantly carved wood furnishings. Accessible rooms are available upon request. Anantara Siam Bangkok Hotel is a 10-minute walk from Central World Plaza and Lumpini Park. Bumrungrad International Hospital is a 12-minute drive away, while Suvarnabhumi International Airport is 25 km away. The Spa by MSpa provides the option of a spa suite with a private plunge pool and complimentary herbal tea and cookies. Guests can head for the health club which has a steam room and offers fitness classes. Younger guests can look forward to treats such as bedtime milk and cookies and a range of children’s toiletries. The hotel provides 9 restaurants and lounges including Italian cuisine and Japanese creations. Local Thai delights are featured at Spice Market while Mocha and Muffins serves a selection of cold cuts, sandwiches and fine wines. Aqua Lounge and The Terrace offer casual dining options.

name: Port Canary Airport Hotel
description: Located in Lat Krabang, 16 km from Mega Bangna, Port Canary Airport Hotel provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, private parking, a garden and a shared lounge. With a terrace, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can enjoy Thai and Vietnamese dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the bar. At the hotel, every room includes a wardrobe. Rooms include a desk and a flat-screen TV, and certain rooms at Port Canary Airport Hotel have a balcony. At the accommodation each room includes bed linen and towels. Speaking English and Thai, staff are ready to help around the clock at the reception. Bangkok International Trade and Exhibition Centre BITEC is 21 km from Port Canary Airport Hotel, while Emporium Shopping Mall is 24 km away. The nearest airport is Suvarnabhumi, 2 km from the hotel, and the property offers a paid airport shuttle service.

name: Four Points by Sheraton Bangkok, Sukhumvit 15
description: Streamline travel with a stay at Four Points by Sheraton Bangkok, Sukhumvit 15. Our hotel sits in the city center on Sukhumvit Road, Bangkok near the retail and dining options at Pratunam Market. Travel throughout Bangkok with ease using the nearby BTS Skytrain. Relax in a spacious room or suite filled with modern amenities, including Four Points Four Comfort Beds, separate showers and tubs, floor-to-ceiling windows, large workspaces and free Wi-Fi. Upgrade to a terrace suite for a fully furnished outdoor space with views of Sukhumvit. Stay fit in our rooftop pool or 24-hour hotel gym before a meal in one of our tempting dining options, including our rooftop bar. If you're planning an event in Bangkok, Thailand, we offer elegant meeting venues with private courtyards paired with expert planning and catering services. Join us soon at Four Points by Sheraton Bangkok, Sukhumvit 15.Marriott

name: Luxx Langsuan Hotel - Sha Plus
description: Located along Bangkok's fashionable Luangsuan Road, LUXX Langsuan Hotel offers easy access to entertainment and transportation links, modern rooms with free Wi-Fi and free parking. Rooms are decorated with teakwood furnishings. Featuring floor to ceiling windows, LUXX Langsuan Hotel rooms feature a balcony, LCD TV with DVD, CD and MP3 player, minibar and tea/coffee maker. Guests can lounge by Luxx's outdoor swimming pool set by the garden. Other services include room service. LUXX Langsuan Hotel is within walking distance from Chidlom and Rajdamri BTS Skytrain Stations. Silom MRT Subway Station is also nearby.

name: Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok
description: Luxurious stays await at Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok, with multiple pools situated within landscaped grounds. Featuring a direct access to Siam Paragon shopping centre, This resort-style hotel boasts free WiFi, fine dining and a world-class spa. Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok enjoys easy access to Siam BTS Skytrain Station through Siam Paragon Mall. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is about 24 km from the hotel. The spacious rooms at Siam Kempinski Hotel Bangkok are contemporary and stylish. Each comes with tea/coffee making facilities with an electric kettle and a flat-screen TV with international channels, while certain rooms provide a pool access. Complimentary soft drinks and local beer are available from the minibar. En suite bathrooms have slippers, free toiletries and a bath or shower. Siam Kempinski boasts 3 restaurants offering an international buffet breakfast, modern Thai cuisine and and all-day dining.

name: Grand Lucky Hotel
description: Boasting a bar, Grand Lucky Hotel is situated in the centre of Bangkok, less than 1 km from Central Embassy. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, room service and a 24-hour front desk, along with free WiFi throughout the property. The property is non-smoking and is located 1.5 km from Amarin Plaza. At the hotel the rooms have air conditioning, a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen, towels and a terrace with a city view. All rooms will provide guests with a wardrobe and a kettle. Gaysorn Village Shopping Mall is 1.6 km from Grand Lucky Hotel, while Central World is 1.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 24 km from the accommodation.

name: Waldorf Astoria Bangkok
description: Blending Thai charm with comfortable luxury, Waldorf Astoria Bangkok is an iconic presence in the heart of Thailand's bustling capital. The hotel's stylish contemporary design is by renowned architectural interior designer Andre Fu and AvroKo. Waldorf Astoria Bangkok presents an exclusive selection of distinctive dining and entertainment venues, spacious and indulgent guest rooms, top-notch relaxation facilities, and efficient meeting facilities. Situated on ultra-modern Magnolias Ratchadamri Boulevard and located in the heart of Ratchaprasong intersection, Waldorf Astoria Bangkok is within walking distance of renowned shopping precincts and tourist landmarks. All guests can enjoy a variety of luxurious in-room and on-property amenities, including - Sumptuous guest rooms, starting at 50 sq. m; with floor-to-ceiling windows - 6 restaurants and bars, including a New-York inspired American grill Bull and Bear and a signature Thai restaurant Front Room - Waldorf Astoria Spa, an intimate wellness escape with a spa treatment menu that embraces cosmopolitan and local cultural influences - Open-air temperature controlled pool with private cabanas, plus a 24-hour fitness studio - Diverse settings with natural light for corporate meetings, social events and weddings - Personal Concierge for entire stay, providing anticipatory yet unobtrusive serviceHilton

name: Capital Mansion - Sha Certified
description: A 10-minute walk from BTS Saphan Kwai Station, The Capital Mansion - SHA Certificate features comfortable accommodation with modern facilities. It boasts an outdoor pool and on-site parking facilities. The Capital Mansion - SHA Certificate is a 5-minute drive from Chatuchak Park and Chatuchak Weekend Market. Donmuang Airport is a 20-minute ride away. Each unit is equipped with air conditioning, a kitchenette and a TV. En suite bathroom comes with shower facilities. For meals, guests can enjoy a variety of Thai and international dishes served at the restaurants located around the property.

name: Bangkok Marriott Hotel The Surawongse
address: 262 Thanon Surawong, Khwaeng Si Phraya, Bangkok 10500
description: Unwind during a romantic escape or move your business forward during a corporate trip to Thailand at Bangkok Marriott Hotel The Surawongse. Our hotel is located on Surawong Road near Chinatown, the Chao Phraya River and the popular Silom shopping district. Find us only a few minutes from Queen Sirikit National Convention Center (QSNCC), one of the largest convention centers in downtown Bangkok. Retreat to a spacious, extended-stay hotel room or suite filled with luxury amenities and décor that merge the traditional and the contemporary. Relax in our hotel's outdoor infinity pool and stay energized in our 24-hour fitness center before a massage at Quan Spa. Dine on tasty Thai treats at Praya Kitchen, serving our signature take on Bangkok street food, or sample classic Chinese cuisine at Yao Restaurant. At the end of your day in Thailand, head to Yao Rooftop Bar for curated cocktails. Bangkok Marriott Hotel The Surawongse transforms every stay in downtown Bangkok into an adventure.Marriott

name: Renaissance Bangkok Ratchaprasong Hotel
description: Experience a new way to work, stay, and play in Bangkok's vibrant city center at Renaissance Bangkok Ratchaprasong Hotel. Our five-star Bangkok city center hotel features modern amenities and upscale accommodations near some of the city's top business and cultural attractions, including the Victory Monument, the Grand Palace, Siam Paragon Mall and the BTS Sky Train. After exploring Ratchaprasong's many delights, revitalize yourself in our hotel's fully equipped fitness center, refreshing indoor pool or tranquil day spa. Treat yourself to authentic Chinese delicacies, seasonal Italian dishes and appetizing tapas at our hotel's delicious on-site restaurants. Make new connections in 20,000 square feet of sophisticated meeting space, customizable for any style or size of event. In the evening, retreat to a luxury room or suite with plush bedding, a sleek bathroom, free Wi-Fi and oversized windows at our Bangkok hotel with a view. Get swept up in the magic of Thailand at Renaissance Bangkok Ratchaprasong Hotel.Marriott

name: Shama Petchburi 47 Bangkok
address: 36 Soi Soonvijai, New Petchburi Rd 47, Bangkok 10310
description: Stylish and luxurious, Shama Petchburi 47 Bangkok is located in Bangkok and features free Wi-Fi, a rooftop pool and a rooftop terrace. There is also a fitness centre with a swimming pool, a sun deck and a rooftop terrace. This 4-star hotel offers a free shuttle service, a coffee bar and a beauty centre. It also includes family-friendly facilities, with room designs and services for families of any size, plus highchairs and babysitting/child services. The rooms are air-conditioned and feature soundproofed windows, a kitchenette, a kitchen and a mini bar. All provide slippers, a refrigerator and a private bathroom with bathrobes. Shama Petchburi 47 Bangkok offers a convenient café where guests can relax with a drink after exploring the area. Shama Petchburi 47 Bangkok provides on-site parking and is an easy drive from Centralworld. The helpful staff at the tour desk are available to organise tours and activities in Bangkok.Revato

name: Novotel Bangkok Ploenchit Sukhumvit
description: "Novotel Bangkok Ploenchit Sukhumvit is located at the heart of Bangkok's city centre, providing a convenient location for both business and leisure. We offer world class facilities, featuring an outdoor swimming pool, gym with sauna and 24/7 à la carte service. Our 4-star hotel is within walking distance to Ploenchit BTS Skytrain Station, Central Embassy and Sukhumvit Road along with attractions and shopping malls such as Siam Paragon and The Emquatier. Let us give you an experience true to Bangkok."accorhotels.com

name: The Siam
description: Situated along the city side of Chaopraya River, The Siam features luxury accommodation with modern facilities. Designed by internationally acclaimed architect Bill Bensley, it boasts an outdoor pool and on-site parking facilities. Free WiFi is available throughout the property. The Siam is located 3 km away from Vimanmek Teak Palace and 5 km away from the popular Grand Palace. Suvarnabhumi International Airport is located 35 km away. Free shuttle boat from the hotel to Sathorn Pier is available from 10:00-18:00 hrs. The villas and the suite are tastefully decorated and equipped with air conditioning, a TV and a minibar. Guests can also enjoy a fresh fruit basket and access to unlimited local phone calls. All stylish bathrooms are fitted with a bathtub and shower facilities. Guests can work out at the well-equipped fitness centre, relax at the spa or curl up with a book at the library. Other services available include a 24-hour front desk, currency exchange and babysitting. Butler services are also available for extra convenience. Set within a cluster of three Thai teak wood houses, Chon Thai Restaurant offers delicious Thai cuisine. Other dining options include Deco Bar & Bistro. Inspired by the jazzy ambiance combined with black and white interiors, it serves international cuisines, as well as cocktails and a great selection of wine.
